text: Aprilsasi Putri Lejarsar Variella (born 6 April 1990) is an Indonesian female badminton player. In 2013, she won Australia Open tournament in women's doubles event with her partner Vita Marissa. == Achievements == === BWF Grand Prix === The BWF Grand Prix has two level such as Grand Prix and Grand Prix Gold. It is a series of badminton tournaments, sanctioned by Badminton World Federation (BWF) since 2007.
